ygData.subject: RE: Binding in evil cities
ygData.msgSnippet: What I would like to know... If you are one of the good aligned races and are agnostic or don t have a religion that very objectionable, are there ways to
ygData.messageBody:
What I would like to know...

If you are one of the good aligned races and are agnostic or don't have a
religion that very objectionable, are there ways to raise your faction such
that you could get into Neriak, Grobb or Ogguk?

I see DE's that have raised their faction and can move around fairly well in
good cities. Is it possible to get into their cities? And not be KOS by
everyone?

I have been grouped with evil ones like an oger or troll and seen a merchant
attack them - in Kithikor wood for example - and if my songs are playing
and effecting my evil partner, the merchants will chase me too!

And how is one supposed to know what the impact of choosing the different
religions will be? I picked Rodcet Nife because it seemed to be a good
philosophy of helping people. But if the cellophane is still on the box and
you are creating your first character - how are you supposed to know which
ones to choose?

Sylly.
